author: Verne, Jules

text: population, it was absolutely necessary that every possible resistance
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: should be made to the devastation that was threatened.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Once satisfied that Servadac and his friends would cooperate with him in
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the raid upon "the thieves," Ben Zoof became calm and content, and began
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: to make various inquiries. "And what has become," he said, "of all our
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: old comrades in Africa?"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "As far as I can tell you," answered the captain, "they are all in
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Africa still; only Africa isn't by any means where we expected to find
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: it."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "And France? Montmartre?" continued Ben Zoof eagerly. Here was the cry
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: of the poor fellow's heart.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: As briefly as he could, Servadac endeavored to explain the true
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: condition of things; he tried to communicate the fact that Paris,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: France, Europe, nay, the whole world was more than eighty millions of
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: leagues away from Gourbi Island; as gently and cautiously as he could
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: he expressed his fear that they might never see Europe, France, Paris,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Montmartre again.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "No, no, sir!" protested Ben Zoof emphatically; "that is all nonsense.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: It is altogether out of the question to suppose that we are not to see
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Montmartre again." And the orderly shook his head resolutely, with the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: air of a man determined, in spite of argument, to adhere to his own
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: opinion.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Very good, my brave fellow," replied Servadac, "hope on, hope while you
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: may. The message has come to us over the sea, 'Never despair'; but one
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: thing, nevertheless, is certain; we must forthwith commence arrangements
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: for making this island our permanent home."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Captain Servadac now led the way to the gourbi, which, by his servant's
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: exertions, had been entirely rebuilt; and here he did the honors of his
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: modest establishment to his two guests, the count and the lieutenant,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: and gave a welcome, too, to little Nina, who had accompanied them on
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: shore, and between whom and Ben Zoof the most friendly relations had
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: already been established.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The adjacent building continued in good preservation, and Captain
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Servadac's satisfaction was very great in finding the two horses, Zephyr
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: and Galette, comfortably housed there and in good condition.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: After the enjoyment of some refreshment, the party proceeded to a
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: general consultation as to what steps must be taken for their future
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: welfare. The most pressing matter that came before them was the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: consideration of the means to be adopted to enable the inhabitants of
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Gallia to survive the terrible cold, which, in their ignorance of the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: true eccentricity of their orbit, might, for aught they knew, last for
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: an almost indefinite period. Fuel was far from abundant; of coal there
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: was none; trees and shrubs were few in number, and to cut them down in
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: prospect of the cold seemed a very questionable policy; but there was
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: no doubt some expedient must be devised to prevent disaster, and that
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: without delay.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The victualing of the little colony offered no immediate difficulty.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Water was abundant, and the cisterns could hardly fail to be replenished
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: by the numerous streams that meandered along the plains; moreover, the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Gallian Sea would ere long be frozen over, and the melted ice (water
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: in its congealed state being divested of every particle of salt) would
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: afford a supply of drink that could not be exhausted. The crops that
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: were now ready for the harvest, and the flocks and herds scattered over
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the island, would form an ample reserve. There was little doubt that
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: throughout the winter the soil would remain unproductive, and no fresh
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: fodder for domestic animals could then be obtained; it would therefore
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: be necessary, if the exact duration of Gallia's year should ever be
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: calculated, to proportion the number of animals to be reserved to the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: real length of the winter.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The next thing requisite was to arrive at a true estimate of the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: number of the population. Without including the thirteen Englishmen at
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Gibraltar, about whom he was not particularly disposed to give himself
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: much concern at present, Servadac put down the names of the eight
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Russians, the two Frenchman, and the little Italian girl, eleven in all,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: as the entire list of the inhabitants of Gourbi Island.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Oh, pardon me," interposed Ben Zoof, "you are mistaking the state of
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the case altogether. You will be surprised to learn that the total of
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: people on the island is double that. It is twenty-two."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Twenty-two!" exclaimed the captain; "twenty-two people on this island?
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: What do you mean?"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "The opportunity has not occurred," answered Ben Zoof, "for me to tell
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: you before, but I have had company."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Explain yourself, Ben Zoof," said Servadac. "What company have you
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: had?"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "You could not suppose," replied the orderly, "that my own unassisted
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: hands could have accomplished all that harvest work that you see has
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: been done."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "I confess," said Lieutenant Procope, "we do not seem to have noticed
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: that."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Well, then," said Ben Zoof, "if you will be good enough to come with me
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: for about a mile, I shall be able to show you my companions. But we must
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: take our guns."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Why take our guns?" asked Servadac. "I hope we are not going to fight."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "No, not with men," said Ben Zoof; "but it does not answer to throw a
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: chance away for giving battle to those thieves of birds."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Leaving little Nina and her goat in the gourbi, Servadac, Count
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Timascheff, and the lieutenant, greatly mystified, took up their guns
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: and followed the orderly. All along their way they made unsparing
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: slaughter of the birds that hovered over and around them. Nearly every
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: species of the feathered tribe seemed to have its representative in that
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: living cloud. There were wild ducks in thousands; snipe, larks, rooks,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: and swallows; a countless variety of sea-birds--widgeons, gulls, and
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: seamews; beside a quantity of game--quails, partridges, and woodcocks.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The sportsmen did their best; every shot told; and the depredators fell
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: by dozens on either hand.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Instead of following the northern shore of the island, Ben Zoof cut
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: obliquely across the plain. Making their progress with the unwonted
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: rapidity which was attributable to their specific lightness, Servadac
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: and his companions soon found themselves near a grove of sycamores and
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: eucalyptus massed in picturesque confusion at the base of a little hill.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Here they halted.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Ah! the vagabonds! the rascals! the thieves!" suddenly exclaimed Ben
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Zoof, stamping his foot with rage.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "How now? Are your friends the birds at their pranks again?" asked the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: captain.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "No, I don't mean the birds: I mean those lazy beggars that are shirking
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: their work. Look here; look there!" And as Ben Zoof spoke, he pointed
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: to some scythes, and sickles, and other implements of husbandry that had
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: been left upon the ground.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "What is it you mean?" asked Servadac, getting somewhat impatient.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Hush, hush! listen!" was all Ben Zoof's reply; and he raised his finger
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: as if in warning.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Listening attentively, Servadac and his associates could distinctly
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: recognize a human voice, accompanied by the notes of a guitar and by the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: measured click of castanets.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Spaniards!" said Servadac.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "No mistake about that, sir," replied Ben Zoof; "a Spaniard would rattle
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: his castanets at the cannon's mouth."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "But what is the meaning of it all?" asked the captain, more puzzled
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: than before.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Hark!" said Ben Zoof; "it is the old man's turn."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: And then a voice, at once gruff and harsh, was heard vociferating, "My
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: money! my money! when will you pay me my money? Pay me what you owe me,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: you miserable majos."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Meanwhile the song continued:
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: _"Tu sandunga y cigarro,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Y una cana de Jerez,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Mi jamelgo y un trabuco,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Que mas gloria puede haver?"_
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Servadac's knowledge of Gascon enabled him partially to comprehend the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: rollicking tenor of the Spanish patriotic air, but his attention was
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: again arrested by the voice of the old man growling savagely, "Pay me
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: you shall; yes, by the God of Abraham, you shall pay me."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "A Jew!" exclaimed Servadac.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Ay, sir, a German Jew," said Ben Zoof.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The party was on the point of entering the thicket, when a singular
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: spectacle made them pause. A group of Spaniards had just begun dancing
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: their national fandango, and the extraordinary lightness which had
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: become the physical property of every object in the new planet made
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the dancers bound to a height of thirty feet or more into the air,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: considerably above the tops of the trees. What followed was irresistibly
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: comic. Four sturdy majos had dragged along with them an old man
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: incapable of resistance, and compelled him, _nolens volens_, to join
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: in the dance; and as they all kept appearing and disappearing above the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: bank of foliage, their grotesque attitudes, combined with the pitiable
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: countenance of their helpless victim, could not do otherwise than recall
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: most forcibly the story of Sancho Panza tossed in a blanket by the merry
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: drapers of Segovia.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Servadac, the count, Procope, and Ben Zoof now proceeded to make their
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: way through the thicket until they came to a little glade, where two men
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: were stretched idly on the grass, one of them playing the guitar, and
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the other a pair of castanets; both were exploding with laughter, as
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: they urged the performers to greater and yet greater exertions in
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the dance. At the sight of strangers they paused in their music, and
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: simultaneously the dancers, with their victim, alighted gently on the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: sward.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Breathless and half exhausted as was the Jew, he rushed with an effort
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: towards Servadac, and exclaimed in French, marked by a strong Teutonic
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: accent, "Oh, my lord governor, help me, help! These rascals defraud me
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: of my rights; they rob me; but, in the name of the God of Israel, I ask
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: you to see justice done!"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The captain glanced inquiringly towards Ben Zoof, and the orderly, by a
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: significant nod, made his master understand that he was to play the part
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: that was implied by the title. He took the cue, and promptly ordered
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the Jew to hold his tongue at once. The man bowed his head in servile
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: submission, and folded his hands upon his breast.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Servadac surveyed him leisurely. He was a man of about fifty, but from
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: his appearance might well have been taken for at least ten years older.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Small and skinny, with eyes bright and cunning, a hooked nose, a short
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: yellow beard, unkempt hair, huge feet, and long bony hands, he presented
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: all the typical characteristics of the German Jew, the heartless, wily
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: usurer, the hardened miser and skinflint. As iron is attracted by the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: magnet, so was this Shylock attracted by the sight of gold, nor would he
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: have hesitated to draw the life-blood of his creditors, if by such means
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: he could secure his claims.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: His name was Isaac Hakkabut, and he was a native of Cologne. Nearly the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: whole of his time, however, he informed Captain Servadac, had been spent
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: upon the sea, his real business being that of a merchant trading at all
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the ports of the Mediterranean. A tartan, a small vessel of two hundred
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: tons burden, conveyed his entire stock of merchandise, and, to say the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: truth, was a sort of floating emporium, conveying nearly every possible
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: article of commerce, from a lucifer match to the radiant fabrics of
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Frankfort and Epinal. Without wife or children, and having no settled
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: home, Isaac Hakkabut lived almost entirely on board the _Hansa_, as he
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: had named his tartan; and engaging a mate, with a crew of three men, as
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: being adequate to work so light a craft, he cruised along the coasts of
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Algeria, Tunis, Egypt, Turkey, and Greece, visiting, moreover, most of
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the harbors of the Levant. Careful to be always well supplied with the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: products in most general demand--coffee, sugar, rice, tobacco, cotton
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: stuffs, and gunpowder--and being at all times ready to barter, and
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: prepared to deal in secondhand wares, he had contrived to amass
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: considerable wealth.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: On the eventful night of the 1st of January the _Hansa_ had been at
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Ceuta, the point on the coast of Morocco exactly opposite Gibraltar. The
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: mate and three sailors had all gone on shore, and, in common with
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: many of their fellow-creatures, had entirely disappeared; but the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: most projecting rock of Ceuta had been undisturbed by the general
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: catastrophe, and half a score of Spaniards, who had happened to be
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: upon it, had escaped with their lives. They were all Andalusian majos,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: agricultural laborers, and naturally as careless and apathetic as men of
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: their class usually are, but they could not help being very considerably
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: embarrassed when they discovered that they were left in solitude upon
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: a detached and isolated rock. They took what mutual counsel they could,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: but became only more and more perplexed. One of them was named Negrete,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: and he, as having traveled somewhat more than the rest, was tacitly
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: recognized as a sort of leader; but although he was by far the most
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: enlightened of them all, he was quite incapable of forming the least
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: conception of the nature of what had occurred. The one thing upon which
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: they could not fail to be conscious was that they had no prospect of
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: obtaining provisions, and consequently their first business was to
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: devise a scheme for getting away from their present abode. The _Hansa_
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: was lying off shore. The Spaniards would not have had the slightest
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: hesitation in summarily taking possession of her, but their utter
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: ignorance of seamanship made them reluctantly come to the conclusion
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: that the more prudent policy was to make terms with the owner.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: And now came a singular part of the story. Negrete and his companions
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: had meanwhile received a visit from two English officers from Gibraltar.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: What passed between them the Jew did not know; he only knew that,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: immediately after the conclusion of the interview, Negrete came to him
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: and ordered him to set sail at once for the nearest point of Morocco.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The Jew, afraid to disobey, but with his eye ever upon the main chance,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: stipulated that at the end of their voyage the Spaniards should pay for
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: their passage--terms to which, as they would to any other, they did not
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: demur, knowing that they had not the slightest intention of giving him a
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: single real.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The _Hansa_ had weighed anchor on the 3rd of February. The wind blew
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: from the west, and consequently the working of the tartan was easy
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: enough. The unpracticed sailors had only to hoist their sails and,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: though they were quite unconscious of the fact, the breeze carried them
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: to the only spot upon the little world they occupied which could afford
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: them a refuge.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Thus it fell out that one morning Ben Zoof, from his lookout on Gourbi
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Island, saw a ship, not the _Dobryna_, appear upon the horizon, and
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: make quietly down towards what had formerly been the right bank of the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Shelif.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Such was Ben Zoof's version of what had occurred, as he had gathered it
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: from the new-comers. He wound up his recital by remarking that the cargo
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: of the _Hansa_ would be of immense service to them; he expected, indeed,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: that Isaac Hakkabut would be difficult to manage, but considered there
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: could be no harm in appropriating the goods for the common welfare,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: since there could be no opportunity now for selling them.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Ben Zoof added, "And as to the difficulties between the Jew and his
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: passengers, I told him that the governor general was absent on a tour of
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: inspection, and that he would see everything equitably settled."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Smiling at his orderly's tactics, Servadac turned to Hakkabut, and told
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: him that he would take care that his claims should be duly investigated
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: and all proper demands should be paid. The man appeared satisfied, and,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: for the time at least, desisted from his complaints and importunities.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: When the Jew had retired, Count Timascheff asked, "But how in the world
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: can you ever make those fellows pay anything?"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "They have lots of money," said Ben Zoof.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Not likely," replied the count; "when did you ever know Spaniards like
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: them to have lots of money?"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "But I have seen it myself," said Ben Zoof; "and it is English money."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "English money!" echoed Servadac; and his mind again reverted to the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: excursion made by the colonel and the major from Gibraltar, about which
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: they had been so reticent. "We must inquire more about this," he said.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Then, addressing Count Timascheff, he added, "Altogether, I think the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: countries of Europe are fairly represented by the population of Gallia."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "True, captain," answered the count; "we have only a fragment of a
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: world, but it contains natives of France, Russia, Italy, Spain, and
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: England. Even Germany may be said to have a representative in the person
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: of this miserable Jew."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "And even in him," said Servadac, "perhaps we shall not find so
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: indifferent a representative as we at present imagine."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: CHAPTER XIX. GALLIA'S GOVERNOR GENERAL
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The Spaniards who had arrived on board the _Hansa_ consisted of nine men
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: and a lad of twelve years of age, named Pablo. They all received Captain
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Servadac, whom Ben Zoof introduced as the governor general, with due
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: respect, and returned quickly to their separate tasks. The captain and
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: his friends, followed at some distance by the eager Jew, soon left the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: glade and directed their steps towards the coast where the _Hansa_ was
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: moored.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: As they went they discussed their situation. As far as they had
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: ascertained, except Gourbi Island, the sole surviving fragments of the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Old World were four small islands: the bit of Gibraltar occupied by the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Englishmen; Ceuta, which had just been left by the Spaniards; Madalena,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: where they had picked up the little Italian girl; and the site of
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the tomb of Saint Louis on the coast of Tunis. Around these there was
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: stretched out the full extent of the Gallian Sea, which apparently
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: comprised about one-half of the Mediterranean, the whole being
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: encompassed by a barrier like a framework of precipitous cliffs, of an
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: origin and a substance alike unknown.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Of all these spots only two were known to be inhabited: Gibraltar, where
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the thirteen Englishmen were amply provisioned for some years to come,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: and their own Gourbi Island. Here there was a population of twenty-two,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: who would all have to subsist upon the natural products of the soil.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: It was indeed not to be forgotten that, perchance, upon some remote and
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: undiscovered isle there might be the solitary writer of the mysterious
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: papers which they had found, and if so, that would raise the census of
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: their new asteroid to an aggregate of thirty-six.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Even upon the supposition that at some future date the whole population
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: should be compelled to unite and find a residence upon Gourbi Island,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: there did not appear any reason to question but that eight hundred
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: acres of rich soil, under good management, would yield them all an ample
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: sustenance. The only critical matter was how long the cold season would
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: last; every hope depended upon the land again becoming productive; at
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: present, it seemed impossible to determine, even if Gallia's orbit
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: were really elliptic, when she would reach her aphelion, and it was
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: consequently necessary that the Gallians for the time being should
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: reckon on nothing beyond their actual and present resources.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: These resources were, first, the provisions of the _Dobryna_, consisting
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: of preserved meat, sugar, wine, brandy, and other stores sufficient for
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: about two months; secondly, the valuable cargo of the _Hansa_, which,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: sooner or later, the owner, whether he would or not, must be compelled
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: to surrender for the common benefit; and lastly, the produce of the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: island, animal and vegetable, which with proper economy might be made to
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: last for a considerable period.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: In the course of the conversation, Count Timascheff took an opportunity
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: of saying that, as Captain Servadac had already been presented to the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Spaniards as governor of the island, he thought it advisable that he
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: should really assume that position.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Every body of men," he observed, "must have a head, and you, as a
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Frenchman, should, I think, take the command of this fragment of a
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: French colony. My men, I can answer for it, are quite prepared to
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: recognize you as their superior officer."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Most unhesitatingly," replied Servadac, "I accept the post with all its
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: responsibilities. We understand each other so well that I feel sure we
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: shall try and work together for the common good; and even if it be our
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: fate never again to behold our fellow creatures, I have no misgivings
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: but that we shall be able to cope with whatever difficulties may be
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: before us."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: As he spoke, he held out his hand. The count took it, at the same time
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: making a slight bow. It was the first time since their meeting that the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: two men had shaken hands; on the other hand, not a single word about
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: their former rivalry had ever escaped their lips; perhaps that was all
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: forgotten now.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The silence of a few moments was broken by Servadac saying, "Do you not
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: think we ought to explain our situation to the Spaniards?"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "No, no, your Excellency," burst in Ben Zoof, emphatically; "the fellows
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: are chicken-hearted enough already; only tell them what has happened,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: and in sheer despondency they will not do another stroke of work."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Besides," said Lieutenant Procope, who took very much the same view
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: as the orderly, "they are so miserably ignorant they would be sure to
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: misunderstand you."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Understand or misunderstand," replied Servadac, "I do not think it
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: matters. They would not care. They are all fatalists. Only give them
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: a guitar and their castanets, and they will soon forget all care and
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: anxiety. For my own part, I must adhere to my belief that it will
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: be advisable to tell them everything. Have you any opinion to offer,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: count?"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "My own opinion, captain, coincides entirely with yours. I have followed
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the plan of explaining all I could to my men on board the _Dobryna_, and
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: no inconvenience has arisen."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Well, then, so let it be," said the captain; adding, "It is not likely
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: that these Spaniards are so ignorant as not to have noticed the change
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: in the length of the days; neither can they be unaware of the physical
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: changes that have transpired. They shall certainly be told that we are
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: being carried away into unknown regions of space, and that this island
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: is nearly all that remains of the Old World."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Ha! ha!" laughed Ben Zoof, aloud; "it will be fine sport to watch the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: old Jew's face, when he is made to comprehend that he is flying away
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: millions and millions of leagues from all his debtors."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Isaac Hakkabut was about fifty yards behind, and was consequently unable
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: to overhear the conversation. He went shambling along, half whimpering
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: and not unfrequently invoking the God of Israel; but every now and then
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: a cunning light gleamed from his eyes, and his lips became compressed
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: with a grim significance.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: None of the recent phenomena had escaped his notice, and more than once
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: he had attempted to entice Ben Zoof into conversation upon the subject;
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: but the orderly made no secret of his antipathy to him, and generally
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: replied to his advances either by satire or by banter. He told him that
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: he had everything to gain under the new system of nights and days, for,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: instead of living the Jew's ordinary life of a century, he would
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: reach to the age of two centuries; and he congratulated him upon the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: circumstance of things having become so light, because it would prevent
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: him feeling the burden of his years. At another time he would declare
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: that, to an old usurer like him, it could not matter in the least what
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: had become of the moon, as he could not possibly have advanced any
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: money upon her. And when Isaac, undaunted by his jeers, persevered in
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: besetting him with questions, he tried to silence him by saying, "Only
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: wait till the governor general comes; he is a shrewd fellow, and will
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: tell you all about it."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "But will he protect my property?" poor Isaac would ask tremulously.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "To be sure he will! He would confiscate it all rather than that you
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: should be robbed of it."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: With this Job's comfort the Jew had been obliged to content himself as
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: best he could, and to await the promised arrival of the governor.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: When Servadac and his companions reached the shore, they found that the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: _Hansa_ had anchored in an exposed bay, protected but barely by a few
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: projecting rocks, and in such a position that a gale rising from the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: west would inevitably drive her on to the land, where she must be dashed
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: in pieces. It would be the height of folly to leave her in her present
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: moorings; without loss of time she must be brought round to the mouth of
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the Shelif, in immediate proximity to the Russian yacht.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The consciousness that his tartan was the subject of discussion made
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the Jew give way to such vehement ejaculations of anxiety, that Servadac
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: turned round and peremptorily ordered him to desist from his clamor.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Leaving the old man under the surveillance of the count and Ben Zoof,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the captain and the lieutenant stepped into a small boat and were soon
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: alongside the floating emporium.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: A very short inspection sufficed to make them aware that both the tartan
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: and her cargo were in a perfect state of preservation. In the hold were
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: sugar-loaves by hundreds, chests of tea, bags of coffee, hogsheads of
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: tobacco, pipes of wine, casks of brandy, barrels of dried herrings,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: bales of cotton, clothing of every kind, shoes of all sizes, caps of
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: various shape, tools, household utensils, china and earthenware, reams
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: of paper, bottles of ink, boxes of lucifer matches, blocks of salt, bags
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: of pepper and spices, a stock of huge Dutch cheeses, and a collection of
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: almanacs and miscellaneous literature. At a rough guess the value could
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: not be much under pounds 5,000 sterling. A new cargo had been taken in
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: only a few days before the catastrophe, and it had been Isaac Hakkabut's
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: intention to cruise from Ceuta to Tripoli, calling wherever he had
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: reason to believe there was likely to be a market for any of his
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: commodities.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "A fine haul, lieutenant," said the captain.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Yes, indeed," said the lieutenant; "but what if the owner refuses to
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: part with it?"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "No fear; no fear," replied the captain. "As soon as ever the old rascal
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: finds that there are no more Arabs or Algerians for him to fleece, he
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: will be ready enough to transact a little business with us. We will pay
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: him by bills of acceptance on some of his old friends in the Old World."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "But why should he want any payment?" inquired the lieutenant. "Under
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the circumstances, he must know that you have a right to make a
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: requisition of his goods."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "No, no," quickly rejoined Servadac; "we will not do that. Just because
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the fellow is a German we shall not be justified in treating him in
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: German fashion. We will transact our business in a business way. Only
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: let him once realize that he is on a new globe, with no prospect of
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: getting back to the old one, and he will be ready enough to come to
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: terms with us."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Perhaps you are right," replied the lieutenant; "I hope you are. But
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: anyhow, it will not do to leave the tartan here; not only would she be
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: in danger in the event of a storm, but it is very questionable whether
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: she could resist the pressure of the ice, if the water were to freeze."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Quite true, Procope; and accordingly I give you the commission to see
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: that your crew bring her round to the Shelif as soon as may be."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "To-morrow morning it shall be done," answered the lieutenant, promptly.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Upon returning to the shore, it was arranged that the whole of the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: little colony should forthwith assemble at the gourbi. The Spaniards
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: were summoned and Isaac, although he could only with reluctance take his
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: wistful gaze from his tartan, obeyed the governor's orders to follow.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: An hour later and the entire population of twenty-two had met in the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: chamber adjoining the gourbi. Young Pablo made his first acquaintance
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: with little Nina, and the child seemed highly delighted to find a
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: companion so nearly of her own age. Leaving the children to entertain
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: each other, Captain Servadac began his address.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Before entering upon further explanation, he said that he counted upon
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the cordial co-operation of them all for the common welfare.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Negrete interrupted him by declaring that no promises or pledges could
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: be given until he and his countrymen knew how soon they could be sent
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: back to Spain.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "To Spain, do you say?" asked Servadac.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "To Spain!" echoed Isaac Hakkabut, with a hideous yell. "Do they expect
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: to go back to Spain till they have paid their debts? Your Excellency,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: they owe me twenty reals apiece for their passage here; they owe me two
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: hundred reals. Are they to be allowed...?"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Silence, Mordecai, you fool!" shouted Ben Zoof, who was accustomed
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: to call the Jew by any Hebrew name that came uppermost to his memory.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Silence!"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Servadac was disposed to appease the old man's anxiety by promising
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: to see that justice was ultimately done; but, in a fever of frantic
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: excitement, he went on to implore that he might have the loan of a few
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: sailors to carry his ship to Algiers.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "I will pay you honestly; I will pay you _well_," he cried; but his
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: ingrained propensity for making a good bargain prompted him to add,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "provided you do not overcharge me."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Ben Zoof was about again to interpose some angry exclamation; but
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Servadac checked him, and continued in Spanish: "Listen to me, my
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: friends. Something very strange has happened. A most wonderful event has
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: cut us off from Spain, from France, from Italy, from every country
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: of Europe. In fact, we have left the Old World entirely. Of the whole
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: earth, nothing remains except this island on which you are now taking
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: refuge. The old globe is far, far away. Our present abode is but an
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: insignificant fragment that is left. I dare not tell you that there is
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: any chance of your ever again seeing your country or your homes."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: He paused. The Spaniards evidently had no conception of his meaning.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Negrete begged him to tell them all again. He repeated all that he had
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: said, and by introducing some illustrations from familiar things,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: he succeeded to a certain extent in conveying some faint idea of the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: convulsion that had happened. The event was precisely what he had
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: foretold. The communication was received by all alike with the most
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: supreme indifference.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Hakkabut did not say a word. He had listened with manifest attention,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: his lips twitching now and then as if suppressing a smile. Servadac
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: turned to him, and asked whether he was still disposed to put out to sea
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: and make for Algiers.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The Jew gave a broad grin, which, however, he was careful to conceal
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: from the Spaniards. "Your Excellency jests," he said in French; and
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: turning to Count Timascheff, he added in Russian: "The governor has made
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: up a wonderful tale."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The count turned his back in disgust, while the Jew sidled up to little
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Nina and muttered in Italian. "A lot of lies, pretty one; a lot of
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: lies!"
