title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: disaster, for the other members of the party had already reached the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: spot where the _Hansa_ lay bound in her icy trammels. A flight of steps,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: recently hewn by Hakkabut himself, gave access for the present to the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: gangway, but it was evident that some different contrivance would
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: have to be resorted to when the tartan should be elevated perhaps to a
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: hundred feet.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: A thin curl of blue smoke issued from the copper funnel that projected
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: above the mass of snow which had accumulated upon the deck of the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: _Hansa_. The owner was sparing of his fuel, and it was only the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: non-conducting layer of ice enveloping the tartan that rendered the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: internal temperature endurable.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Hi! old Nebuchadnezzar, where are you?" shouted Ben Zoof, at the full
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: strength of his lungs.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: At the sound of his voice, the cabin door opened, and the Jew's head and
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: shoulders protruded onto the deck.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: CHAPTER VI. MONEY AT A PREMIUM
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Who's there? I have nothing here for anyone. Go away!" Such was the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: inhospitable greeting with which Isaac Hakkabut received his visitors.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Hakkabut! do you take us for thieves?" asked Servadac, in tones of
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: stern displeasure.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Oh, your Excellency, my lord, I did not know that it was you," whined
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the Jew, but without emerging any farther from his cabin.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Now, old Hakkabut, come out of your shell! Come and show the governor
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: proper respect, when he gives you the honor of his company," cried Ben
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Zoof, who by this time had clambered onto the deck.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: After considerable hesitation, but still keeping his hold upon the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: cabin-door, the Jew made up his mind to step outside. "What do you
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: want?" he inquired, timorously.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "I want a word with you," said Servadac, "but I do not want to stand
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: talking out here in the cold."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Followed by the rest of the party, he proceeded to mount the steps. The
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Jew trembled from head to foot. "But I cannot let you into my cabin. I
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: am a poor man; I have nothing to give you," he moaned piteously.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Here he is!" laughed Ben Zoof, contemptuously; "he is beginning his
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: chapter of lamentations over again. But standing out here will never do.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Out of the way, old Hakkabut, I say! out of the way!" and, without more
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: ado, he thrust the astonished Jew on one side and opened the door of the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: cabin.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Servadac, however, declined to enter until he had taken the pains to
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: explain to the owner of the tartan that he had no intention of laying
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: violent hands upon his property, and that if the time should ever come
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: that his cargo was in requisition for the common use, he should receive
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: a proper price for his goods, the same as he would in Europe.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Europe, indeed!" muttered the Jew maliciously between his teeth.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "European prices will not do for me. I must have Gallian prices--and of
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: my own fixing, too!"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: So large a portion of the vessel had been appropriated to the cargo that
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the space reserved for the cabin was of most meager dimensions. In one
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: corner of the compartment stood a small iron stove, in which smoldered a
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: bare handful of coals; in another was a trestle-board which served as a
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: bed; two or three stools and a rickety deal table, together with a few
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: cooking utensils, completed a stock of furniture which was worthy of its
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: proprietor.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: On entering the cabin, Ben Zoof's first proceeding was to throw on the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: fire a liberal supply of coals, utterly regardless of the groans of poor
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Isaac, who would almost as soon have parted with his own bones as submit
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: to such reckless expenditure of his fuel. The perishing temperature
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: of the cabin, however, was sufficient justification for the orderly's
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: conduct, and by a little skillful manipulation he soon succeeded in
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: getting up a tolerable fire.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The visitors having taken what seats they could, Hakkabut closed the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: door, and, like a prisoner awaiting his sentence, stood with folded
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: hands, expecting the captain to speak.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Listen," said Servadac; "we have come to ask a favor."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Imagining that at least half his property was to be confiscated, the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Jew began to break out into his usual formula about being a poor man and
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: having nothing to spare; but Servadac, without heeding his complainings,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: went on: "We are not going to ruin you, you know."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Hakkabut looked keenly into the captain's face.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "We have only come to know whether you can lend us a steelyard."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: So far from showing any symptom of relief, the old miser exclaimed,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: with a stare of astonishment, as if he had been asked for some thousand
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: francs: "A steelyard?"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Yes!" echoed the professor, impatiently; "a steelyard."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Have you not one?" asked Servadac.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "To be sure he has!" said Ben Zoof.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Old Isaac stammered and stuttered, but at last confessed that perhaps
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: there might be one amongst the stores.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Then, surely, you will not object to lend it to us?" said the captain.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Only for one day," added the professor.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The Jew stammered again, and began to object. "It is a very delicate
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: instrument, your Excellency. The cold, you know, the cold may do injury
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: to the spring; and perhaps you are going to use it to weigh something
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: very heavy."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Why, old Ephraim, do you suppose we are going to weigh a mountain with
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: it?" said Ben Zoof.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Better than that!" cried out the professor, triumphantly; "we are going
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: to weigh Gallia with it; my comet."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Merciful Heaven!" shrieked Isaac, feigning consternation at the bare
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: suggestion.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Servadac knew well enough that the Jew was holding out only for a good
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: bargain, and assured him that the steelyard was required for no other
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: purpose than to weigh a kilogramme, which (considering how much lighter
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: everything had become) could not possibly put the slightest strain upon
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the instrument.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The Jew still spluttered, and moaned, and hesitated.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Well, then," said Servadac, "if you do not like to lend us your
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: steelyard, do you object to sell it to us?"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Isaac fairly shrieked aloud. "God of Israel!" he ejaculated, "sell my
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: steelyard? Would you deprive me of one of the most indispensable of
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: my means of livelihood? How should I weigh my merchandise without my
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: steelyard--my solitary steelyard, so delicate and so correct?"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The orderly wondered how his master could refrain from strangling the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: old miser upon the spot; but Servadac, rather amused than otherwise,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: determined to try another form of persuasion. "Come, Hakkabut, I see
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: that you are not disposed either to lend or to sell your steelyard. What
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: do you say to letting us hire it?"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The Jew's eyes twinkled with a satisfaction that he was unable to
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: conceal. "But what security would you give? The instrument is very
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: valuable;" and he looked more cunning than ever.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "What is it worth? If it is worth twenty francs, I will leave a deposit
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: of a hundred. Will that satisfy you?"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: He shook his head doubtfully. "It is very little; indeed, it is too
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: little, your Excellency. Consider, it is the only steelyard in all this
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: new world of ours; it is worth more, much more. If I take your deposit
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: it must be in gold--all gold. But how much do you agree to give me for
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the hire--the hire, one day?"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "You shall have twenty francs," said Servadac.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Oh, it is dirt cheap; but never mind, for one day, you shall have it.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Deposit in gold money a hundred francs, and twenty francs for the hire."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The old man folded his hands in meek resignation.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "The fellow knows how to make a good bargain," said Servadac, as Isaac,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: after casting a distrustful look around, went out of the cabin.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Detestable old wretch!" replied the count, full of disgust.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Hardly a minute elapsed before the Jew was back again, carrying his
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: precious steelyard with ostentatious care. It was of an ordinary kind.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: A spring balance, fitted with a hook, held the article to be weighed;
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: a pointer, revolving on a disc, indicated the weight of the article.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Professor Rosette was manifestly right in asserting that such a machine
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: would register results quite independently of any change in the force
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: of attraction. On the earth it would have registered a kilogramme as a
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: kilogramme; here it recorded a different value altogether, as the result
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: of the altered force of gravity.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Gold coinage to the worth of one hundred and twenty francs was handed
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: over to the Jew, who clutched at the money with unmistakable eagerness.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The steelyard was committed to the keeping of Ben Zoof, and the visitors
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: prepared to quit the _Hansa_.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: All at once it occurred to the professor that the steelyard would be
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: absolutely useless to him, unless he had the means for ascertaining the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: precise measurement of the unit of the soil of Gallia which he proposed
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: to weigh. "Something more you must lend me," he said, addressing the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Jew. "I must have a measure, and I must have a kilogramme."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "I have neither of them," answered Isaac. "I have neither. I am sorry; I
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: am very sorry." And this time the old Jew spoke the truth. He would have
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: been really glad to do another stroke or two of business upon terms as
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: advantageous as the transaction he had just concluded.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Palmyrin Rosette scratched his head in perplexity, glaring round upon
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: his companions as if they were personally responsible for his annoyance.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: He muttered something about finding a way out of his difficulty, and
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: hastily mounted the cabin-ladder. The rest followed, but they had hardly
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: reached the deck when the chink of money was heard in the room below.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Hakkabut was locking away the gold in one of the drawers.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Back again, down the ladder, scrambled the little professor, and before
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the Jew was aware of his presence he had seized him by the tail of his
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: slouchy overcoat. "Some of your money! I must have money!" he said.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Money!" gasped Hakkabut; "I have no money." He was pale with fright,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: and hardly knew what he was saying.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Falsehood!" roared Rosette. "Do you think I cannot see?" And peering
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: down into the drawer which the Jew was vainly trying to close, he cried,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Heaps of money! French money! Five-franc pieces! the very thing I want!
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: I must have them!"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The captain and his friends, who had returned to the cabin looked on
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: with mingled amusement and bewilderment.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "They are mine!" shrieked Hakkabut.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "I will have them!" shouted the professor.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "You shall kill me first!" bellowed the Jew.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "No, but I must!" persisted the professor again.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: It was manifestly time for Servadac to interfere. "My dear professor,"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: he said, smiling, "allow me to settle this little matter for you."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Ah! your Excellency," moaned the agitated Jew, "protect me! I am but a
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: poor man--"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "None of that, Hakkabut. Hold your tongue." And, turning to Rosette,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the captain said, "If, sir, I understand right, you require some silver
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: five-franc pieces for your operation?"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Forty," said Rosette, surlily.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Two hundred francs!" whined Hakkabut.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Silence!" cried the captain.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "I must have more than that," the professor continued. "I want ten
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: two-franc pieces, and twenty half-francs."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Let me see," said Servadac, "how much is that in all? Two hundred and
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: thirty francs, is it not?"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "I dare say it is," answered the professor.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Count, may I ask you," continued Servadac, "to be security to the Jew
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: for this loan to the professor?"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Loan!" cried the Jew, "do you mean only a loan?"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Silence!" again shouted the captain.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Count Timascheff, expressing his regret that his purse contained only
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: paper money, begged to place it at Captain Servadac's disposal.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "No paper, no paper!" exclaimed Isaac. "Paper has no currency in
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Gallia."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "About as much as silver," coolly retorted the count.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "I am a poor man," began the Jew.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Now, Hakkabut, stop these miserable lamentations of yours, once for
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: all. Hand us over two hundred and thirty francs in silver money, or we
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: will proceed to help ourselves."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Isaac began to yell with all his might: "Thieves! thieves!"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: In a moment Ben Zoof's hand was clasped tightly over his mouth. "Stop
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: that howling, Belshazzar!"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Let him alone, Ben Zoof. He will soon come to his senses," said
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Servadac, quietly.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: When the old Jew had again recovered himself, the captain addressed him.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Now, tell us, what interest do you expect?"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Nothing could overcome the Jew's anxiety to make another good bargain.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: He began: "Money is scarce, very scarce, you know--"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "No more of this!" shouted Servadac. "What interest, I say, what
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: interest do you ask?"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Faltering and undecided still, the Jew went on. "Very scarce, you know.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Ten francs a day, I think, would not be unreasonable, considering--"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The count had no patience to allow him to finish what he was about
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: to say. He flung down notes to the value of several rubles. With a
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: greediness that could not be concealed, Hakkabut grasped them all.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Paper, indeed, they were; but the cunning Israelite knew that they would
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: in any case be security far beyond the value of his cash. He was making
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: some eighteen hundred per cent. interest, and accordingly chuckled
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: within himself at his unexpected stroke of business.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The professor pocketed his French coins with a satisfaction far more
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: demonstrative. "Gentlemen," he said, "with these franc pieces I obtain
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the means of determining accurately both a meter and a kilogramme."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: CHAPTER VII. GALLIA WEIGHED
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: A quarter of an hour later, the visitors to the _Hansa_ had reassembled
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: in the common hall of Nina's Hive.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Now, gentlemen, we can proceed," said the professor. "May I request
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: that this table may be cleared?"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Ben Zoof removed the various articles that were lying on the table, and
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the coins which had just been borrowed from the Jew were placed upon it
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: in three piles, according to their value.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The professor commenced. "Since none of you gentlemen, at the time
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: of the shock, took the precaution to save either a meter measure or
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: a kilogramme weight from the earth, and since both these articles are
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: necessary for the calculation on which we are engaged, I have been
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: obliged to devise means of my own to replace them."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: This exordium delivered, he paused and seemed to watch its effect
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: upon his audience, who, however, were too well acquainted with the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: professor's temper to make any attempt to exonerate themselves from the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: rebuke of carelessness, and submitted silently to the implied reproach.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "I have taken pains," he continued, "to satisfy myself that these
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: coins are in proper condition for my purpose. I find them unworn and
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: unchipped; indeed, they are almost new. They have been hoarded instead
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: of circulated; accordingly, they are fit to be utilized for my purpose
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: of obtaining the precise length of a terrestrial meter."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Ben Zoof looked on in perplexity, regarding the lecturer with much the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: same curiosity as he would have watched the performances of a traveling
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: mountebank at a fair in Montmartre; but Servadac and his two friends had
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: already divined the professor's meaning. They knew that French coinage
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: is all decimal, the franc being the standard of which the other coins,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: whether gold, silver, or copper, are multiples or measures; they knew,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: too, that the caliber or diameter of each piece of money is rigorously
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: determined by law, and that the diameters of the silver coins
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: representing five francs, two francs, and fifty centimes measure
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: thirty-seven, twenty-seven, and eighteen millimeters respectively; and
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: they accordingly guessed that Professor Rosette had conceived the plan
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: of placing such a number of these coins in juxtaposition that the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: length of their united diameters should measure exactly the thousand
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: millimeters that make up the terrestrial meter.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The measurement thus obtained was by means of a pair of compasses
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: divided accurately into ten equal portions, or decimeters, each of
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: course 3.93 inches long. A lath was then cut of this exact length and
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: given to the engineer of the _Dobryna_, who was directed to cut out of
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the solid rock the cubic decimeter required by the professor.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The next business was to obtain the precise weight of a kilogramme. This
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: was by no means a difficult matter. Not only the diameters, but also the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: weights, of the French coins are rigidly determined by law, and as the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: silver five-franc pieces always weigh exactly twenty-five grammes,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the united weight of forty of these coins is known to amount to one
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: kilogramme.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Oh!" cried Ben Zoof; "to be able to do all this I see you must be rich
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: as well as learned."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: With a good-natured laugh at the orderly's remark, the meeting adjourned
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: for a few hours. By the appointed time the engineer had finished his
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: task, and with all due care had prepared a cubic decimeter of the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: material of the comet.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Now, gentlemen," said Professor Rosette, "we are in a position to
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: complete our calculation; we can now arrive at Gallia's attraction,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: density, and mass."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Everyone gave him his complete attention.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Before I proceed," he resumed, "I must recall to your minds Newton's
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: general law, 'that the attraction of two bodies is directly proportional
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: to the product of their masses, and inversely proportional to the square
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: of their distances.'"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Yes," said Servadac; "we remember that."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Well, then," continued the professor, "keep it in mind for a
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: few minutes now. Look here! In this bag are forty five-franc
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: pieces--altogether they weigh exactly a kilogramme; by which I mean that
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: if we were on the earth, and I were to hang the bag on the hook of the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: steelyard, the indicator on the dial would register one kilogramme. This
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: is clear enough, I suppose?"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: As he spoke the professor designedly kept his eyes fixed upon Ben Zoof.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: He was avowedly following the example of Arago, who was accustomed
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: always in lecturing to watch the countenance of the least intelligent
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: of his audience, and when he felt that he had made his meaning clear to
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: him, he concluded that he must have succeeded with all the rest. In
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: this case, however, it was technical ignorance, rather than any lack
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: of intelligence, that justified the selection of the orderly for this
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: special attention.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Satisfied with his scrutiny of Ben Zoof's face, the professor went on.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "And now, gentlemen, we have to see what these coins weigh here upon
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Gallia."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: He suspended the money bag to the hook; the needle oscillated, and
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: stopped. "Read it off!" he said.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The weight registered was one hundred and thirty-three grammes.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "There, gentlemen, one hundred and thirty-three grammes! Less than
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: one-seventh of a kilogramme! You see, consequently, that the force of
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: gravity here on Gallia is not one-seventh of what it is upon the earth!"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Interesting!" cried Servadac, "most interesting! But let us go on and
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: compute the mass."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "No, captain, the density first," said Rosette.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Certainly," said the lieutenant; "for, as we already know the volume,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: we can determine the mass as soon as we have ascertained the density."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The professor took up the cube of rock. "You know what this is," he went
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: on to say. "You know, gentlemen, that this block is a cube hewn from
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the substance of which everywhere, all throughout your voyage of
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: circumnavigation, you found Gallia to be composed--a substance to which
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: your geological attainments did not suffice to assign a name."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Our curiosity will be gratified," said Servadac, "if you will enlighten
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: our ignorance."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: But Rosette did not take the slightest notice of the interruption.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "A substance it is which no doubt constitutes the sole material of
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the comet, extending from its surface to its innermost depths. The
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: probability is that it would be so; your experience confirms that
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: probability: you have found no trace of any other substance. Of this
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: rock here is a solid decimeter; let us get at its weight, and we shall
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: one-seventh of what it is upon the earth, and shall consequently have to
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: multiply the apparent weight of our cube by seven, in order to ascertain
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: its proper weight. Do you understand me, goggle-eyes?"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: This was addressed to Ben Zoof, who was staring hard at him. "No!" said
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Ben Zoof.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "I thought not; it is of no use waiting for your puzzle-brains to make
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: it out. I must talk to those who can understand."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The professor took the cube, and, on attaching it to the hook of the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: steelyard, found that its apparent weight was one kilogramme and four
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: hundred and thirty grammes.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Here it is, gentlemen; one kilogramme, four hundred and thirty grammes.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Multiply that by seven; the product is, as nearly as possible, ten
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: kilogrammes. What, therefore, is our conclusion? Why, that the density
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: one-fifteenth instead of one-seventh of the terrestrial attraction."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The professor could not refrain from exhibiting his gratification that,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: however inferior in volume, in density, at least, his comet had the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: advantage over the earth.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: finished to the determining of the mass or weight. This was a matter of
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: little labor.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Let me see," said the captain; "what is the force of gravity upon the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: various planets?"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "You can't mean, Servadac, that you have forgotten that? But you always
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: were a disappointing pupil."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The captain could not help himself: he was forced to confess that his
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: memory had failed him.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Well, then," said the professor, "I must remind you. Taking the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: attraction on the earth as 1, that on Mercury is 1.15, on Venus it
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: kilogrammes."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Therefore, if a man upon the surface of the sun were to fall down, he
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: would have considerable difficulty in getting up again. A cannon ball,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "A jolly battle-field for cowards!" exclaimed Ben Zoof.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Not so jolly, Ben Zoof, as you fancy," said his master; "the cowards
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: would be too heavy to run away."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: its inhabitants such an increase of strength and agility, he was almost
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: sorry that it had not been a little smaller still.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Though it could not anyhow have been very much smaller," he added,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: looking slyly at the professor.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: wind would blow it away."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "I must take care of my head, then, and hold it on," replied the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: irrepressible orderly.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Servadac detained him.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: is the nature of the soil of Gallia?"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Yes, I can answer that. And in this matter I do not think your
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: impertinent orderly will venture to put Montmartre into the comparison.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space

author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "And the sum of the specific gravities of these two substances is 10,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "A comet of gold!" ejaculated the captain.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Yes; a realization of what the illustrious Maupertuis has already
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: deemed probable," replied the astronomer.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the count.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "No doubt about it!" said Rosette, with manifest satisfaction. "It would
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: supply the world with about 246,000 trillions of francs."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "It would make gold about as cheap as dirt, I suppose," said Servadac.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The last observation, however, was entirely lost upon the professor, who
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: had left the hall with an air almost majestic, and was already on his
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: way to the observatory.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

author: Verne, Jules

text: to his master, when next day they were alone together.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "That's just the charm of them, my good fellow," was the captain's cool
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: reply, "that they are of no use whatever."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space

text: CHAPTER VIII. JUPITER SOMEWHAT CLOSE
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Except as to the time the comet would take to revolve round the sun,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: it must be confessed that all the professor's calculations had
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: comparatively little interest for anyone but himself, and he was
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: consequently left very much to pursue his studies in solitude.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The following day was the 1st of August, or, according to Rosette,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the 63rd of April. In the course of this month Gallia would travel
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: 16,500,000 leagues, attaining at the end a distance of 197,000,000
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: leagues from the sun. This would leave 81,000,000 leagues more to be
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: traversed before reaching the aphelion of the 15th of January, after
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: which it would begin once more to approach the sun.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: But meanwhile, a marvelous world, never before so close within the range
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: of human vision, was revealing itself. No wonder that Palmyrin Rosette
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: cared so little to quit his observatory; for throughout those calm,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: clear Gallian nights, when the book of the firmament lay open before
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: him, he could revel in a spectacle which no previous astronomer had ever
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: been permitted to enjoy.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The glorious orb that was becoming so conspicuous an object was none
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: other than the planet Jupiter, the largest of all the bodies existing
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: within the influence of solar attraction. During the seven months that
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: had elapsed since its collision with the earth, the comet had been
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: continuously approaching the planet, until the distance between them was
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: scarcely more than 61,000,000 leagues, and this would go on diminishing
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: until the 15th of October.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Under these circumstances, was it perfectly certain that no danger
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: could accrue? Was not Gallia, when its pathway led it into such close
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: proximity to this enormous planet, running a risk of being attracted
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: within its influence? Might not that influence be altogether disastrous?
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The professor, it is true, in his estimate of the duration of his
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: comet's revolution, had represented that he had made all proper
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: allowances for any perturbations that would be caused either by
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Jupiter, by Saturn, or by Mars; but what if there were any errors in
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: his calculations? what if there should be any elements of disturbance on
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: which he had not reckoned?
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Speculations of this kind became more and more frequent, and Lieutenant
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Procope pointed out that the danger incurred might be of a fourfold
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: character: first, that the comet, being irresistibly attracted, might
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: be drawn on to the very surface of the planet, and there annihilated;
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: secondly, that as the result of being brought under that attraction, it
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: might be transformed into a satellite, or even a sub-satellite, of that
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: mighty world; thirdly, that it might be diverted into a new orbit, which
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: would never be coincident with the ecliptic; or, lastly, its course
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: might be so retarded that it would only reach the ecliptic too late to
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: permit any junction with the earth. The occurrence of any one of these
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: contingencies would be fatal to their hopes of reunion with the globe,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: from which they had been so strangely severed.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: To Rosette, who, without family ties which he had never found leisure or
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: inclination to contract, had no shadow of desire to return to the earth,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: it would be only the first of these probabilities that could give him
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: any concern. Total annihilation might not accord with his views, but he
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: would be quite content for Gallia to miss its mark with regard to
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: of the milky way. The rest of the community, however, by no means
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: sympathized with the professor's sentiments, and the following month was
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: rushing on in a straight line towards the overwhelming luminary.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The more they contemplated the character of this gigantic planet, the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: more they became impressed with the likelihood of a serious perturbation
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: in their own course. The diameter of Jupiter is 85,390 miles, nearly
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: that important disturbances might result from his proximity.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules
