title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: was fain to hold his tongue, and slunk back into his dim hole.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

author: Verne, Jules

text: atmosphere to atmosphere.

author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space

author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space

author: Verne, Jules

text: disruption, rushed into the open air.

author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: telescope.

author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: It was no time for condolence.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: A new marvel arrested every eye. A fresh satellite, in the gloom of
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: night, was shining conspicuously before them.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: That satellite was a part of Gallia itself!
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

author: Verne, Jules

author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: garrisons!

text: CHAPTER XVII. THE VENTURE MADE
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: What would be the consequences of this sudden and complete disruption,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The first change that came under their observation was the rapidity of
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the sun's appearances and disappearances, forcing them to the conviction
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: talking about the 238th of June, and the 325th of December.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: round the comet, but was gradually retreating into space. Whether it

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space

author: Verne, Jules

text: But the professor was in the worst of tempers. Generally taciturn and
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: morose, he was more than usually uncivil whenever any one ventured to
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: speak to him. The loss of his telescope had doubtless a great deal to do
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: with his ill-humor; but the captain drew the most favorable conclusions
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: from Rosette's continued irritation. Had the comet been in any way
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: projected from its course, so as to be likely to fail in coming into
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: contact with the earth, the professor would have been quite unable
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: to conceal his satisfaction. But they required to know more than the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: general truth, and felt that they had no time to lose in getting at the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: exact details.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The opportunity that was wanted soon came.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: On the 18th, Rosette was overheard in furious altercation with Ben Zoof.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The orderly had been taunting the astronomer with the mutilation of his
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: little comet. A fine thing, he said, to split in two like a child's toy.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: It had cracked like a dry nut; and mightn't one as well live upon an
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: exploding bomb?--with much more to the same effect. The professor, by
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: way of retaliation, had commenced sneering at the "prodigious" mountain
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: of Montmartre, and the dispute was beginning to look serious when
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Servadac entered.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Thinking he could turn the wrangling to some good account, so as to
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: arrive at the information he was so anxiously seeking, the captain
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: pretended to espouse the views of his orderly; he consequently brought
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: upon himself the full force of the professor's wrath.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Rosette's language became more and more violent, till Servadac, feigning
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: to be provoked beyond endurance, cried:
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "You forget, sir, that you are addressing the Governor-General of
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Gallia."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Governor-General! humbug!" roared Rosette. "Gallia is my comet!"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "I deny it," said Servadac. "Gallia has lost its chance of getting back
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: to the earth. Gallia has nothing to do with you. Gallia is mine; and you
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: must submit to the government which I please to ordain."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "And who told you that Gallia is not going back to the earth?" asked the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: professor, with a look of withering scorn.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Why, isn't her mass diminished? Isn't she split in half? Isn't her
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: velocity all altered?" demanded the captain.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "And pray who told you this?" again said the professor, with a sneer.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Everybody. Everybody knows it, of course," replied Servadac.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Everybody is very clever. And you always were a very clever scholar
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: too. We remember that of old, don't we?"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Sir!"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "You nearly mastered the first elements of science, didn't you?"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Sir!"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "A credit to your class!"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Hold your tongue, sir!" bellowed the captain again, as if his anger was
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: uncontrollable.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Not I," said the professor.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Hold your tongue!" repeated Servadac.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Just because the mass is altered you think the velocity is altered?"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Hold your tongue!" cried the captain, louder than ever.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "What has mass to do with the orbit? Of how many comets do you know the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: mass, and yet you know their movements? Ignorance!" shouted Rosette.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Insolence!" retorted Servadac.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Ben Zoof, really thinking that his master was angry, made a threatening
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: movement towards the professor.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Touch me if you dare!" screamed Rosette, drawing himself up to the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: fullest height his diminutive figure would allow. "You shall answer for
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: your conduct before a court of justice!"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Where? On Gallia?" asked the captain.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "No; on the earth."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "The earth! Pshaw! You know we shall never get there; our velocity is
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: changed."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "On the earth," repeated the professor, with decision.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Trash!" cried Ben Zoof. "The earth will be too far off!"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Not too far off for us to come across her orbit at 42 minutes and 35.6
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: seconds past two o'clock on the morning of this coming 1st of January."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Thanks, my dear professor--many thanks. You have given me all the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: information I required;" and, with a low bow and a gracious smile, the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: captain withdrew. The orderly made an equally polite bow, and followed
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: his master. The professor, completely nonplussed, was left alone.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Thirteen days, then--twenty-six of the original Gallian days, fifty-two
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: of the present--was all the time for preparation that now remained.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Every preliminary arrangement was hurried on with the greatest
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: earnestness.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: There was a general eagerness to be quit of Gallia. Indifferent to
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the dangers that must necessarily attend a balloon ascent under such
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: unparalleled circumstances, and heedless of Lieutenant Procope's warning
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: that the slightest check in their progress would result in instantaneous
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: combustion, they all seemed to conclude that it must be the simplest
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: thing possible to glide from one atmosphere to another, so that they
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: were quite sanguine as to the successful issue of their enterprise.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Captain Servadac made a point of showing himself quite enthusiastic in
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: his anticipations, and to Ben Zoof the going up in a balloon was the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: supreme height of his ambition. The count and the lieutenant, of colder
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: and less demonstrative temperament, alike seemed to realize the possible
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: perils of the undertaking, but even they were determined to put a bold
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: face upon every difficulty.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The sea had now become navigable, and three voyages were made to Gourbi
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Island in the steam launch, consuming the last of their little reserve
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: of coal.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The first voyage had been made by Servadac with several of the sailors.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: They found the gourbi and the adjacent building quite uninjured by
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the severity of the winter; numbers of little rivulets intersected the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: pasture-land; new plants were springing up under the influence of the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: equatorial sun, and the luxuriant foliage was tenanted by the birds
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: which had flown back from the volcano. Summer had almost abruptly
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: succeeded to winter, and the days, though only three hours long, were
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: intensely hot.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Another of the voyages to the island had been to collect the dry grass
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: and straw which was necessary for inflating the balloon. Had the balloon
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: been less cumbersome it would have been conveyed to the island,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: whence the start would have been effected; but as it was, it was more
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: convenient to bring the combustible material to the balloon.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The last of the coal having been consumed, the fragments of the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: shipwrecked vessels had to be used day by day for fuel. Hakkabut began
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: making a great hubbub when he found that they were burning some of the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: spars of the _Hansa_; but he was effectually silenced by Ben Zoof, who
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: told him that if he made any more fuss, he should be compelled to pay
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: 50,000 francs for a balloon-ticket, or else he should be left behind.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: By Christmas Day everything was in readiness for immediate departure.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The festival was observed with a solemnity still more marked than the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: anniversary of the preceding year. Every one looked forward to spending
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: New Year's Day in another sphere altogether, and Ben Zoof had already
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: promised Pablo and Nina all sorts of New Year's gifts.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: It may seem strange, but the nearer the critical moment approached, the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: less Hector Servadac and Count Timascheff had to say to each other on
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the subject. Their mutual reserve became more apparent; the experiences
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: of the last two years were fading from their minds like a dream; and the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: fair image that had been the cause of their original rivalry was ever
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: rising, as a vision, between them.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The captain's thoughts began to turn to his unfinished rondo; in
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: his leisure moments, rhymes suitable and unsuitable, possible and
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: impossible, were perpetually jingling in his imagination. He labored
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: under the conviction that he had a work of genius to complete. A poet he
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: had left the earth, and a poet he must return.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Count Timascheff's desire to return to the world was quite equaled by
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Lieutenant Procope's. The Russian sailors' only thought was to follow
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: their master, wherever he went. The Spaniards, though they would have
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: been unconcerned to know that they were to remain upon Gallia, were
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: nevertheless looking forward with some degree of pleasure to revisiting
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the plains of Andalusia; and Nina and Pablo were only too delighted
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: at the prospect of accompanying their kind protectors on any fresh
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: excursion whatever.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The only malcontent was Palmyrin Rosette. Day and night he persevered
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: in his astronomical pursuits, declared his intention of never abandoning
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: his comet, and swore positively that nothing should induce him to set
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: foot in the car of the balloon.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The misfortune that had befallen his telescope was a never-ending theme
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: of complaint; and just now, when Gallia was entering the narrow zone of
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: shooting-stars, and new discoveries might have been within his reach,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: his loss made him more inconsolable than ever. In sheer desperation, he
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: endeavored to increase the intensity of his vision by applying to his
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: eyes some belladonna which he found in the _Dobryna's_ medicine chest;
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: with heroic fortitude he endured the tortures of the experiment, and
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: gazed up into the sky until he was nearly blind. But all in vain; not a
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: single fresh discovery rewarded his sufferings.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: No one was quite exempt from the feverish excitement which prevailed
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the event of its descending in the sea at a short distance from the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: shore. If unfortunately, it should come down in mid-ocean, nothing but
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: certain fate of being drowned.

author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The 31st came. Twenty-four hours hence and the balloon, with its large
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

author: Verne, Jules

text: apprehended.

author: Verne, Jules

text: more than 4,000,000 miles from the earth; and this interval was being

text: earth being about 70,000 miles, that of the comet being little less than

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

author: Verne, Jules

author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space

author: Verne, Jules

author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: hard?"

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space

author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space

author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: to keep the air in the interior at a proper temperature.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Beneath their feet was extended the basin of the Gallian Sea. An
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: inconsiderable speck to the north marked the site of Gourbi Island.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Ceuta and Gibraltar, which might have been expected in the west, had
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: utterly disappeared. On the south rose the volcano, the extremity of the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: promontory that jutted out from the continent that formed the framework
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: of the sea; whilst in every direction the strange soil, with its
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: commixture of tellurium and gold, gleamed under the sun's rays with a
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: perpetual iridescence.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Apparently rising with them in their ascent, the horizon was
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: well-defined. The sky above them was perfectly clear; but away in the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: it could not be an asteroid, but like a dim meteor. It was the fragment
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: that the internal convulsion had rent from the surface of the comet,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: into which it had been projected. During the hours of daylight it
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: was far from distinct, but after nightfall it would assume a definite
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: luster.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The object, however, of supreme interest was the great expanse of the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: terrestrial disc, which was rapidly drawing down obliquely towards them.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: It totally eclipsed an enormous portion of the firmament above, and
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: approaching with an ever-increasing velocity, was now within half its
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: average distance from the moon. So close was it, that the two poles
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: could not be embraced in one focus. Irregular patches of greater or
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: less brilliancy alternated on its surface, the brighter betokening the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: continents, the more somber indicating the oceans that absorbed the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: solar rays. Above, there were broad white bands, darkened on the side
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: averted from the sun, exhibiting a slow but unintermittent movement;
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: these were the vapors that pervaded the terrestrial atmosphere.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: But as the aeronauts were being hurried on at a speed of 70 miles
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: a second, this vague aspect of the earth soon developed itself into
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: definite outlines. Mountains and plains were no longer confused, the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: distinction between sea and shore was more plainly identified, and
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: instead of being, as it were, depicted on a map, the surface of the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: earth appeared as though modelled in relief.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Twenty-seven minutes past two, and Gallia is only 72,000 miles from the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: terrestrial sphere; quicker and quicker is the velocity; ten minutes
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: later, and they are only 36,000 miles apart!
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The whole configuration of the earth is clear.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Europe! Russia! France!" shout Procope, the count, and Servadac, almost
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: in a breath.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: And they are not mistaken. The eastern hemisphere lies before them
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: in the full blaze of light, and there is no possibility of error in
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: distinguishing continent from continent.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The surprise only kindled their emotion to yet keener intensity, and it
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: would be hard to describe the excitement with which they gazed at the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: panorama that was before them. The crisis of peril was close at hand,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: but imagination overleaped all consideration of danger; and everything
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: circle of humanity from which they had supposed themselves severed
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: forever.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: And, truly, if they could have paused to study it, that panorama of
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the states of Europe which was outstretched before their eyes, was
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: conspicuous for the fantastic resemblances with which Nature on the one
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: hand, and international relations on the other, have associated them.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: There was England, marching like some stately dame towards the east,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: trailing her ample skirts and coroneted with the cluster of her little
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: islets; Sweden and Norway, with their bristling spine of mountains,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: seemed like a splendid lion eager to spring down from the bosom of the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: ice-bound north; Russia, a gigantic polar bear, stood with its head
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: towards Asia, its left paw resting upon Turkey, its right upon Mount
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Caucasus; Austria resembled a huge cat curled up and sleeping a watchful
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: sleep; Spain, with Portugal as a pennant, like an unfurled banner,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: floated from the extremity of the continent; Turkey, like an insolent
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: cock, appeared to clutch the shores of Asia with the one claw, and the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: land of Greece with the other; Italy, as it were a foot and leg encased
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: in a tight-fitting boot, was juggling deftly with the islands of Sicily,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Sardinia, and Corsica; Prussia, a formidable hatchet imbedded in the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: heart of Germany, its edge just grazing the frontiers of France; whilst
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: France itself suggested a vigorous torso with Paris at its breast.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: All at once Ben Zoof breaks the silence: "Montmartre! I see Montmartre!"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space

author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space

text: below him, bright in the general irradiation which was flooding the

text: surrounding space.

author: Verne, Jules

author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space

text: montgolfier might retain its necessary level. Servadac and the count
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space

text: continued to gaze upon the earth with an eagerness that almost amounted
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space

author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the other.

author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: upon _terra firma_, would it be in a place where adequate resources for
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space

author: Verne, Jules

text: now.

author: Verne, Jules

author: Verne, Jules

text: "Forty-two minutes past!" said the lieutenant, and his voice seemed to
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: thrill through the silence of expectation.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: There were not 20,000 miles between the comet and the earth!

author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: minutes more and collision must ensue!

author: Verne, Jules

author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "No doubt," said Ben Zoof, "this time we shall stick together."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Another thought occurred. Was it not only too likely that, in the fusion
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: of the two atmospheres, the balloon itself, in which they were being
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: conveyed, would be rent into ribbons, and every one of its passengers
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: hurled into destruction, so that not a Gallian should survive to tell
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the tale of their strange peregrinations?
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Moments were precious; but Hector Servadac resolved that he would adopt
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: a device to secure that at least some record of their excursion in solar
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: distances should survive themselves.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Tearing a leaf from his note-book, he wrote down the name of the comet,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the list of the fragments of the earth it had carried off, the names
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: of his companions, and the date of the comet's aphelion; and having
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: subscribed it with his signature, turned to Nina and told her he must
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: have the carrier-pigeon which was nestling in her bosom.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The child's eyes filled with tears; she did not say a word, but
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: imprinting a kiss upon its soft plumage, she surrendered it at once, and
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the message was hurriedly fastened to its neck. The bird wheeled round
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: and round in a few circles that widened in their diameter, and quickly
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: sunk to an altitude in the comet's atmosphere much inferior to the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: balloon.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Some minutes more were thus consumed and the interval of distance was
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: reduced to less than 8,000 miles.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The velocity became inconceivably great, but the increased rate of
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: motion was in no way perceptible; there was nothing to disturb the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: equilibrium of the car in which they were making their aerial adventure.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Forty-six minutes!" announced the lieutenant.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The glowing expanse of the earth's disc seemed like a vast funnel,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: yawning to receive the comet and its atmosphere, balloon and all, into
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: its open mouth.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Forty-seven!" cried Procope.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: There was half a minute yet. A thrill ran through every vein. A
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: vibration quivered through the atmosphere. The montgolfier, elongated
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: to its utmost stretch, was manifestly being sucked into a vortex. Every
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: passenger in the quivering car involuntarily clung spasmodically to its
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: sides, and as the two atmospheres amalgamated, clouds accumulated in
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: heavy masses, involving all around in dense obscurity, while flashes of
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: lurid flame threw a weird glimmer on the scene.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: In a mystery every one found himself upon the earth again. They could
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: not explain it, but here they were once more upon terrestrial soil; in
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: a swoon they had left the earth, and in a similar swoon they had come
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: back!
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Of the balloon not a vestige remained, and contrary to previous
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: computation, the comet had merely grazed the earth, and was traversing
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the regions of space, again far away!
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: CHAPTER XIX. BACK AGAIN
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "In Algeria, captain?"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Yes, Ben Zoof, in Algeria; and not far from Mostaganem." Such were the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: first words which, after their return to consciousness, were exchanged
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: between Servadac and his orderly.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: They had resided so long in the province that they could not for a
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: moment be mistaken as to their whereabouts, and although they were
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: incapable of clearing up the mysteries that shrouded the miracle, yet
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: they were convinced at the first glance that they had been returned to
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the earth at the very identical spot where they had quitted it.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: In fact, they were scarcely more than a mile from Mostaganem, and in
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the course of an hour, when they had all recovered from the bewilderment
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: occasioned by the shock, they started off in a body and made their way
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: to the town. It was a matter of extreme surprise to find no symptom of
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the least excitement anywhere as they went along. The population was
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: perfectly calm; every one was pursuing his ordinary avocation; the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: cattle were browsing quietly upon the pastures that were moist with the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: dew of an ordinary January morning. It was about eight o'clock; the sun
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: was rising in the east; nothing could be noticed to indicate that
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: any abnormal incident had either transpired or been expected by the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: inhabitants. As to a collision with a comet, there was not the faintest
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: trace of any such phenomenon crossing men's minds, and awakening, as
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: it surely would, a panic little short of the certified approach of the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: millennium.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Nobody expects us," said Servadac; "that is very certain."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "No, indeed," answered Ben Zoof, with a sigh; he was manifestly
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: disappointed that his return to Mostaganem was not welcomed with a
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: triumphal reception.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: They reached the Mascara gate. The first persons that Servadac
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: recognized were the two friends that he had invited to be his seconds in
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the duel two years ago, the colonel of the 2nd Fusiliers and the captain
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: of the 8th Artillery. In return to his somewhat hesitating salutation,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the colonel greeted him heartily, "Ah! Servadac, old fellow! is it you?"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "I, myself," said the captain.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Where on earth have you been to all this time? In the name of peace,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: what have you been doing with yourself?"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "You would never believe me, colonel," answered Servadac, "if I were to
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: tell you; so on that point I had better hold my tongue."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Hang your mysteries!" said the colonel; "tell me, where have you been?"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "No, my friend, excuse me," replied Servadac; "but shake hands with me
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: in earnest, that I may be sure I am not dreaming." Hector Servadac
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: had made up his mind, and no amount of persuasion could induce him to
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: divulge his incredible experiences.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Anxious to turn the subject, Servadac took the earliest opportunity of
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: asking, "And what about Madame de L----?"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Madame de L-----!" exclaimed the colonel, taking the words out of his
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: mouth; "the lady is married long ago; you did not suppose that she was
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: going to wait for you. 'Out of sight, out of mind,' you know."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "True," replied Servadac; and turning to the count he said, "Do you hear
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: that? We shall not have to fight our duel after all."
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "Most happy to be excused," rejoined the count. The rivals took each
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: other by the hand, and were united henceforth in the bonds of a sincere
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: and confiding friendship.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: "An immense relief," said Servadac to himself, "that I have no occasion
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: to finish that confounded rondo!"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: It was agreed between the captain and the count that it would be
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: desirable in every way to maintain the most rigid silence upon the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: subject of the inexplicable phenomena which had come within their
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: experience. It was to them both a subject of the greatest perplexity to
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: find that the shores of the Mediterranean had undergone no change,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: but they coincided in the opinion that it was prudent to keep their
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: bewilderment entirely to themselves. Nothing induced them to break their
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: reserve.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The very next day the small community was broken up.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The _Dobryna's_ crew, with the count and the lieutenant, started for
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Russia, and the Spaniards, provided, by the count's liberality, with a
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: competency that ensured them from want, were despatched to their native
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: shores. The leave taking was accompanied by genuine tokens of regard and
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: goodwill.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: For Isaac Hakkabut alone there was no feeling of regret. Doubly ruined
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: by the loss of his tartan, and by the abandonment of his fortune, he
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: disappeared entirely from the scene. It is needless to say that no
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: one troubled himself to institute a search after him, and, as Ben Zoof
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: sententiously remarked, "Perhaps old Jehoram is making money in America
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: by exhibiting himself as the latest arrival from a comet!"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: But however great was the reserve which Captain Servadac might make
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: on his part, nothing could induce Professor Rosette to conceal his
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: experiences. In spite of the denial which astronomer after astronomer
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: gave to the appearance of such a comet as Gallia at all, and of its
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: being refused admission to the catalogue, he published a voluminous
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: treatise, not only detailing his own adventures, but setting forth, with
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the most elaborate precision, all the elements which settled its period
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: and its orbit. Discussions arose in scientific circles; an overwhelming
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: majority decided against the representations of the professor; an
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: unimportant minority declared themselves in his favor, and a pamphlet
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: obtained some degree of notice, ridiculing the whole debate under the
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: title of "The History of an Hypothesis." In reply to this impertinent
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: criticism of his labors, Rosette issued a rejoinder full with the most
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: vehement expressions of indignation, and reiterating his asseveration
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: that a fragment of Gibraltar was still traversing the regions of space,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: carrying thirteen Englishmen upon its surface, and concluding by saying
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: that it was the great disappointment of his life that he had not been
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: taken with them.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Pablo and little Nina were adopted, the one by Servadac, the other
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: by the count, and under the supervision of their guardians, were well
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: educated and cared for. Some years later, Colonel, no longer Captain,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Servadac, his hair slightly streaked with grey, had the pleasure of
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: seeing the handsome young Spaniard united in marriage to the Italian,
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: now grown into a charming girl, upon whom the count bestowed an ample
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: dowry; the young people's happiness in no way marred by the fact that
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: they had not been destined, as once seemed likely, to be the Adam and
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: Eve of a new world.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: The career of the comet was ever a mystery which neither Servadac nor
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: his orderly could eliminate from the regions of doubt. Anyhow, they were
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: firmer and more confiding friends than ever.
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: One day, in the environs of Montmartre, where they were secure from
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: eavesdroppers, Ben Zoof incidentally referred to the experiences in
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: the depths of Nina's Hive; but stopped short and said, "However, those
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: things never happened, sir, did they?"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: His master could only reply, "Confound it, Ben Zoof! What is a man to
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

text: believe?"
title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules

title: Off on a Comet! a Journey through Planetary Space
author: Verne, Jules
